column4: If I install Windows XP, and after that Hoary... and when Breezy comes, i'd like to clear the reinstall ubuntu instead of upgrading the distro - what should I do ?
*** Do a Clean installation of Ubuntu *** (had a typo)

If I have windows XP installed and Ubuntu Hoary installed, and when breezy comes out, i'd like to delete the hoary installation and reinstall breezy (w.o damaging my windows) How can I do that ? -- I don't want to use  upgrade-distro
simply replace the hoary occurrences on /etc/apt/sources.list with breezy
